content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I used the "execute_shell" command to add a repository and update the system before attempting to install the "translate-shell" package again. However, the package was not available for Debian 11. I used the "google" command to search for alternative ways to translate text from the command line and found the "trans" command. I then used the "execute_shell" command to install the "trans" package, but it was not available in the default Debian repositories. I used the "execute_shell" command again to add the necessary repository and update the system, but the "add-apt-repository" command was not available on Debian 11. I used the "execute_shell" command to install the "software-properties-common" package, which includes the command.'}
"""
